name: alchemize
description: Mimify & pretty print source code with ease.

scripts.build-js: browserify src/scripts/index.js>dist/index.js && browserify src/scripts/worker.js>dist/worker.js && browserify src/scripts/workerService > dist/workerService.js
scripts.build-icons: convert -background none resources/icon-16.svg dist/icons/16.png & convert -background none resources/icon.svg dist/icons/128.png & convert -background none -density 512 -resize 512x resources/icon.svg dist/icons/512.png;
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run build-js;wait; npm run build-css & npm run build-misc & npm run build-icons;wait
scripts.build-web: npm run build;cp web/* dist-www/;cp dist/* dist-www/app/ -r

author: Ash Kyd <ash@kyd.com.au>
